item.title: Web Scraping (Twitter)
item.description: For my honours project (for more details, check the ‘Projects’ tab), I needed to build a program that would scrape Twitter/X for tweets. This was done using the snscrape library and Python. This project also had a front-end interface in order to give the program inputs instead of doing it through the CLI. The program takes in the number of total tweets wanted and what hashtag you want the scraper to crawl through to collect them.
